Attributes.description: Written and oral communication. Preparation of design reports, business correspondence, verbal, online, and visual presentation of technical material. Restricted to students in the second year of Mechanical Engineering.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: A score of 65% or higher in one of ENGL 112, WRDS 150, APSC 176.
Attributes.coreq: Co-reqs: All of MECH 220, MECH 221, MECH 222, MECH 223, MECH 224, MECH 225.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: West, Room: Mall
